department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biostatistics

course.title: Genomic Data Manipulation
course.meeting_text: M., W., 3:30–5:20, and a weekly 90-minute lab.
course.description: Introduction to genomic data, computational methods for interpreting these data, and survey of current functional genomics research. Covers biological data processing, programming for large datasets, high-throughput data (sequencing, proteomics, expression, etc.), and related publications.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO508.
